name: Metra 95-5817 Double-DIN Stereo Installation Dash Kit Fits Select 1995-2011 Ford, Lincoln, Mercury, and Mazda Vehicles
short_description: Stereo installation kit designed to fit any standard 4” tall aftermarket radio
Sub-dash modifications are necessary to gain suitable depth and height
Once the kit is snapped in, it cannot be removed without dash panel removal
Made from the highest quality ABS plastic for an original factory-like fit and finish
Includes brackets and hardware parts needed with installation instructions
A tech support number is available for installation help 7 days a week
Made in the USA
product_description: This stereo installation kit is engineered to help you install an aftermarket 4” tall (Double-DIN) radio into the original vehicle dashboard. This dash kit helps make radio replacement easier and is designed to match the original look and feel of the vehicle’s dashboard. Modifications to the dashboard are required for this installation and instructions are included. Installing an aftermarket radio can upgrade the sound quality and provide additional features the original factory radio couldn’t offer but requires this dash kit to make it fit.

short_description: Perfect Fit - Designed specifically for select 2004-2021 GM Vehicles, the Scosche GM2500B dash kit ensures a seamless fit for your Single or Double DIN car stereo radio. See Fit Guide in images to verify compatibility.

Easy Installation - The Scosche GM2500B radio installation kit comes with all necessary hardware, making it simple to install your new car stereo without the need for professional help. No special tools required. Includes step-by-step instructions.

product_description: Upgrade your car's audio system with the Scosche ICGM8BN, the perfect installation kit for Select Non-Amplified 2000-2012 General Motors vehicles. Designed for a seamless fit, this radio dash kit allows you to install a new car stereo without compromising your car's interior aesthetics. Whether you're looking to enhance your stereo experience with audiophile sound or add a touch of modernity with Bluetooth, CarPlay or Android Auto, this stereo dash kit is your go-to solution for a professional looking installation. The ICGM8BN dash kit is crafted with precision to ensure a snug and secure fit for your aftermarket radio. With its factory quality construction, it withstands the test of time. The kit includes all the necessary hardware for a straightforward radio installation process, making it a breeze for DIY enthusiasts and professional installers. Say goodbye to compatibility issues and hello to a no hassle stereo installation. This kit is not just about functionality; it's also about elevating your car's interior. The sleek design complements your vehicle's dashboard, while the durable materials used ensure that your radio remains intact through all your journeys. Get ready to enjoy a flawless experience with the Scosche ICGM8BN, your ultimate partner for stereo upgrades. .
